items.sentence: Do you really think that this will ruin my reputation?
It's a miracle that our house survived the earthquake.
If Tom hadn't done it, somebody else would've done it.
In case of a medical emergency, who should we contact?
Tom set off for Boston this morning on his motorcycle.
The garden is full of very beautiful flowers all year.
When playing chess, be careful not to lose your queen.
Tom has decided to donate his body to medical science.
Tom went down on one knee and asked Mary to marry him.
I don't want to waste any more time trying to do this.
Tom lost the debate, but he still refuses to admit it.
Tom knew better than to tell Mary about what happened.
As far as I know, Tom hasn't committed any crimes yet.
I know what I saw and you can't convince me otherwise.
Tom's guardian angel must have been watching over him.
I have a friend in Boston who's majoring in chemistry.
This laboratory is equipped with the latest computers.
Tom doesn't have enough experience to operate a train.
Tom takes a pill with vitamins and minerals every day.
I'm fairly certain we're supposed to be there by 2:30.
It's hard to believe that Tom really wants to do that.
Hey, Tom. I've got something I think you ought to see.
Tell Tom to call me tomorrow at 2:30 in the afternoon.
The food at that restaurant wasn't all that delicious.
Where did you buy that hat you were wearing yesterday?
Even if that were true, what difference would it make?
Tom wasn't able to figure out how to get the box open.
We've lost way too much money trying to change things.
Tom thought about it and realized that Mary was right.
I'll try to keep Tom from leaving before you get here.
Tom not only ate his dessert, he also ate Mary's, too.
I've been living in this house for about thirty years.
The last time I was sick, I was in bed for three days.
Tell me that I'm not the only one who saw this coming.
I may be old and ugly, but I'm still smarter than you.
I don't think that you and I can do that by ourselves.
I thought that we were supposed to eat lunch together.
I'm not the one who took out the garbage this morning.
I have no idea what the weather will be like tomorrow.
That's not the main reason Tom didn't want to do that.
Mary likes the new dress that her mother made for her.
Apparently, there is nothing that cannot happen today.
How long would it take me to get to the zoo from here?
Don't wolf your food down. You should eat more slowly.
Yesterday was the first time I've ever seen Tom drunk.
Here, drink this coffee while I fry some eggs for you.
Have you ever done something that you regretted doing?
Tom and Mary are drinking coffee together on the deck.
Tom slowly opened the present that Mary had given him.
It wasn't as hard to do that as I thought it would be.
